mapper.select: SELECT i.instruct_quantity, r.regist_quantity, r.regist_LOT, r.regist_label, r.regist_error, r.regist_date, r.regist_product_no, r.regist_instruct_no, r.code_no, r.inspection FROM produce_instruct i JOIN produce_regist r ON i.instruct_no = r.regist_instruct_no ORDER BY i.instruct_no DESC
SELECT 'LOT_'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'rrrr')||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(regist_LOT,-4)),0)+1,4,0) as regist_LOT FROM produce_regist WHERE regist_LOT LIKE 'LOT_'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'rrrr')||'%'
SELECT 'BACODE_'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'rrrr')||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(regist_label,-4)),0)+1,4,0) as regist_label FROM produce_regist WHERE regist_label LIKE 'BACODE_'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'rrrr')||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO produce_regist ( regist_LOT, regist_quantity, regist_label, regist_error, regist_product_no, regist_instruct_no, code_no, inspection ) VALUES ( #{registLOT}, #{registQuantity}, #{registLabel}, #{registError}, #{registProductNo}, #{registInstructNo}, #{codeNo}, #{inspection} )
